title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.
